examples.example: 我每天都会喝一毫升的牛奶来补充营养。

translate.english: I drink one milliliter of milk every day to supplement nutrition.

examples.example: 我小心翼翼地量出一毫升珍贵的药剂，准备进行重要的实验。

translate.english: I carefully measured out one milliliter of precious reagent, preparing to conduct an important experiment.

examples.example: 我往杯子里倒了一毫升蜂蜜，让水变得更加香甜。

translate.english: I poured one milliliter of honey into the cup to make the water sweeter.
